rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance designed for wheelchair accessibility with automatic doors and a ramp.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Vastu-aligned seating arrangement facing East for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the Living Room, with a large window for natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen with wheelchair-accessible counters and storage. Positioned in the South-west corner per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom for guests located on the Eastern side of the floor plan.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Large master suite with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet, oriented North-West according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Connected to the Master Bedroom for privacy and natural ventilation.

openings.details: Multiple large windows on eastern and southern walls for abundant daylight, following Vastu guidelines.
Wheelchair-accessible doorways throughout the ground floor.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and space for residents.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom with built-in storage solutions.

rooms.name: Study/Occupational Room
rooms.description: Quiet study area optimized for work and home office use.

rooms.name: Family Lounge
rooms.description: Cozy family room with natural light and comfortable seating.

openings.details: Wheelchair-accessible elevator installed on the ground floor for vertical movement between levels.
All doorways are designed to be wheelchair-friendly.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Lavish rooftop terrace featuring built-in seating, garden area, and space for outdoor dining. Designed with accessibility in mind.

openings.details: Wheelchair-accessible elevator leading directly to the rooftop terrace.
